{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Samsung |model=WEA524i |revision= |series=AC2300 |fcc_date=08/22/2017 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |availability=new |type=enterprise access point |fcc_id=A3LWEA524I |ic_id=649E-WEA524I |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.75 |pwr_conn=PoE-PD |pwr_poe=af, at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |ram1=512 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, RJ45,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9994 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9994 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, DFS, SON, CLI, LACP, Link Aggregation, |stock_os=Linux;3.14.43; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=00:0F:02, F4:D9:FB |oui_eth=00:0F:02, F4:D9:FB }} {{TagLine|Enterprise WLAN Access Point}} :[http://images.samsung.com/is/content/samsung/p5/sec/business/network/publication/data-sheet/Datasheet_WEA524i.pdf Datasheet] ([https://www.sublibrary.com/view?t=WEA524i+-+Samsung+Networks&u=https%3A%2F%2Fsamsung-networks.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2018%2F06%2FSamsung_DataSheet_WEA524i_Digital_FINAL.pdf DS])
"WEA524i ED41-00197A PCS01A" (or similar) is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos.
{{WiFiCert|WFA72563|07/03/2017}} :[http://feature.wifi.calavista.com/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA72563 WFA72563] <!--{{FCC ST|02/17/2018|indexme.}}-->
